portfolio.name: Tanjeem Azwad Zaman
portfolio.title: Ph.D. Student in Computational Biology
portfolio.institution: Carnegie Mellon University - School of Computer Science

about.short: Passionate about Bioinformatics, Algorithms, and Machine Learning
about.long: I'm Tanjeem, a Ph.D. student (Fall'25) in the Joint CMU-Pitt PhD Program in Computational Biology, under Carnegie Mellon University's School of Computer Science. I completed my undergraduate from the Department of Computer Science & Engineering (CSE) at Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology (BUET). My research interests lie in Bioinformatics, Algorithms and Machine Learning.
